posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob
All,

This is my first time selling on the forum but I have bought some cards from a few people in the past.  

I have the following cards for sale. 

Prices and pictures  are below. 

Please email me if interested. 

1888 R&S Artistic
New York - SGC 50 = $200 
(Nice looking card )
 
George Close E94
Joe Lake(Rare violet background)– SGC A(Trimmed)=  $200

T206
Dot Miller (Piedmont 350) – PSA 3 = $60
Left Leifield Pitching (Piedmont 150) – PSA 4 = $125
Nick Maddox (Piedmont 350) – PSA 4 = $125
Bill Abstein (Piedmont 350) – PSA 2 = $40

1915 Cracker Jack
Richard Rudolph – SGC 40 = $175
